comment:
Variables:
- \( x \): number of large cruise ship trips
- \( y \): number of small cruise ship trips

Constants:
- Large cruise ship capacity: 2000 customers
- Small cruise ship capacity: 800 customers
- Large cruise ship pollution: 20 units
- Small cruise ship pollution: 15 units
- Maximum number of large cruise ship trips: 7
- Minimum percentage of small cruise ship trips: 40%
- Minimum number of total trips: 20000 customers

Objective:
Minimize total pollution produced

Constraints:
1. Total number of customers transported:
\[ 2000x + 800y \geq 20000 \]
2. Maximum number of large cruise ship trips:
\[ x \leq 7 \]
3. Minimum percentage of small cruise ship trips:
\[ y \geq 0.4(x+y) \]
